EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Ordering Service Scheduled Maintenance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This communication is a notification of a scheduled maintenance that will occur on Thursday, January 27th between 3:00 AM and 4:00 AM EST for approximately 10 minutes. No downtime is expected; however, Order Version History before January 27th will be deleted. These efforts are to prepare our services for anticipated Super Bowl LVI traffic.
Products Impacted: NCR Ordering Microservice on the Business Services Platform
Description of Change: NCR Order Version history before January 27th, 2022 will be deleted
We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding as we make this change.
If you have any questions, please reach out to Ashley Paek, Brandon Brinker, or Eric Goetschalckx.
